dct_title_s: A Plan of the ruins of Babylon and of the surrounding country
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. At head of map: Dr. William Smith's Ancient atlas. 42. From: Atlas of ancient geography, biblical and classical ... / edited by William Smith and George Grove. London : J. Murray, 1874.
dct_publisher_sm: London : John Murray ... , 1874 ([London] : Stanford's Geographical Estabt.)
